actionUnits.condition: Physics-based trigger: invoke OtherLaneController.OnTriggerEnter (IEnumerator) on MonoBehaviour fileID 127885130 (script GUID: 9cde80f2fe6fe6e47b57eb962721c06f) when a GameObject with tag 'Ball' and a Rigidbody enters the MeshCollider (id: 127885132, isTrigger: true) of Plane (1). After a 5-second wait in the coroutine, the script should read BallSoundController.peso/pesoEnKgs from the entering ball, destroy it, then instantiate bolaPrefab (guid: 1be75124d3e50ad4997a90e0d8d1fe74, fileID: 424594858964415916) at aparicionBola (Transform id: 165335085), apply BallSoundController.changePeso(), and add an impulse via Rigidbody.AddForce.

Validate mapping: MonoBehaviour id:1620417931 on GameObject id:1620417930 uses script guid:9cde80f2fe6fe6e47b57eb962721c06f (OtherLaneController). Serialized fields: aparicionBola=fileID:165335085, bolaPrefab guid:1be75124d3e50ad4997a90e0d8d1fe74 fileID:424594858964415916. Collider config: MeshCollider id:1620417933 isTrigger:true, convex:true; GameObject has no Rigidbody (Has_Rigidbody:false). Target event to cover: IEnumerator OnTriggerEnter(Collider other) with 5s wait, requires other.tag == 'Ball' and other has BallSoundController (with fields peso, pesoEnKgs). Expected behavior after 5s: destroy incoming ball, propagate its peso/pesoEnKgs to bolaPrefab via BallSoundController.changePeso(), instantiate at aparicionBola and apply Rigidbody.AddForce((1,0,0)*1.5, Impulse). This will be automatically triggered when a rigidbody 'Ball' collider enters Plane (2)'s trigger.

Call Mirar.Mira() then Mirar.Para() on the same frame-separated trigger to toggle the Canvas. This component is identified by script GUID 8817b2a8c34ba5d4d941beaf47d0be6f (fields: canvas=3689742487867136667, camaraAMirar=Camera.main assigned in Start).

Invoke BallSoundController.changePeso() to re-apply mass and update the TMP text. Component identified by script GUID 8fcde7f4195eca944bfe1e2addf5338a (fields: peso=0.7, pesoEnKgs=7, textoPeso=4278895081965267523).
